TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SendContent extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An abstract base class for classes that represent the data sent to a workflow service.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the SendContent class to specify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> for a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity.
[!code-cs[ContentBasedCorrelation#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ac_18_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent Create(class System.Activities.InArgument message) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified message.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendContent> class to specify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> for a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity. This example uses a lambda expression to specify the <xref:System.Activities.InArgument>. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=182082)
[!code-cs[ContentBasedCorrelation#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/6be8a2e4-b79b-4af3-90c2-_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendParametersContent Create(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, class System.Activities.InArgument> parameters) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of name/value pairs with the keys containing the parameter names and the values containing the arguments.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent Create (System.Activities.InArgument message, Type declaredMessageType);
.method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent Create(class System.Activities.InArgument message, class System.Type declaredMessageType) cil managed

Docs.param: The data type that will appear in the service description and WSDL. It must be either the same as the argument type of the message or its base type.
Docs.summary: Creates a new instance with the specified message and message type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the declared message type, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType%2A>.
